org.jppf.server.scheduler.bundle

Class AbstractAdaptiveBundler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.server.scheduler.bundle.AbstractBundler
      • org.jppf.server.scheduler.bundle.AbstractAdaptiveBundler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bundler, BundlerEx, ContextAwareness, NodeAwareness

    public abstract class AbstractAdaptiveBundler
extends AbstractBundler
implements BundlerEx, NodeAwareness, ContextAwareness

      • feedback

        public void feedback(int size,
            double totalTime,
            double accumulatedElapsed,
            double overheadTime)
        Description copied from interface: BundlerEx
        Feedback the bundler with the result of using the bundle with the specified size. The feedback data consists in providing a number of tasks that were executed, and their total execution time in milliseconds. The execution time includes the network round trip between node and server.
        Specified by:
        feedback in interface BundlerEx
        Parameters:
        size - number of tasks that were executed.
        totalTime - the total execution and transport time in nanoseconds.
        accumulatedElapsed - the total accumalated elapsed time (in the node) in nanoseconds for the execution of the tasks.
        overheadTime - the transport time in nanoseconds.

      • getJPPFContext

        public JPPFContext getJPPFContext()
        Description copied from interface: ContextAwareness
        Get the corresponding node's context information.
        Specified by:
        getJPPFContext in interface ContextAwareness
        Returns:
        a JPPFContext instance.

      • setJPPFContext

        public void setJPPFContext(JPPFContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ContextAwareness
        Set the corresponding node's context information. This method is called before Bundler.setup() with context instance. And with null after Bundler.dispose().
        Specified by:
        setJPPFContext in interface ContextAwareness
        Parameters:
        context - a JPPFContext instance.
